closing (for the day, esp. of a restaurant or bar), closing time
leading player, prima donna, box-office star
best item one has (to show), one's sole Sunday best, one's single area of expertise

to consider as, to regard (as equivalent), to deem (as), to equate
to see through (a plot, lie, etc.), to penetrate into, to discover, to find out

r_ele.r: かんごふようせいじょ

sense.gloss: seeing through, perceiving, noticing, getting wind of
to care for (the sick), to nurse, to attend (someone's deathbed)
seeing through (e.g. someone's lies), reading (e.g. thoughts), penetrating, detecting

sdata.j: ↑看護↑↓かんご↓↑婦↑↓ふ↓は↑病人↑↓びょうにん↓の↑世話↑↓せわ↓をする。
sdata.e: Nurses attend to sick people.
